title: The Week of Wisdom with Oscar Martinez, the Consulting Hero
summary: Oscar Martinez, a retired consultant, uses his intellect and experience to foil a corporate espionage plot over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Oscar Martinez, ein pensionierter Berater, nutzt seinen Verstand und seine Erfahrung, um eine Verschwörung zur Wirtschaftsspionage im Laufe einer Woche zu vereiteln.
summaryDutch: Oscar Martinez, een gepensioneerde consultant, gebruikt zijn intellect en ervaring om een bedrijfsspionagecomplot in de loop van een week te verijdelen.
summaryFrench: Oscar Martinez, un consultant à la retraite, utilise son intelligence et son expérience pour déjouer un complot d'espionnage industriel au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Oscar discovers unusual activity in his old firm's financial reports while consulting as a favor.
After lecturing on ethics in business, he uses the session's Q&A to gather more opinions on peculiar corporate behaviors.
Oscar covertly meets with an old colleague who confirms his suspicions of espionage.
Using his contacts, Oscar digs deeper and identifies the culprits planning to sell secrets.
Oscar strategically leaks information to the right people, ensuring the spies are caught red-handed.
At a celebratory lecture, Oscar subtly hints at his role in thwarting the plot, receiving a standing ovation.
Enjoying a quiet day, Oscar reflects on his actions, feeling content that he could protect many jobs.

ending: In the quiet of his study, Oscar Martinez smiled, knowing wisdom and experience had once again proved invaluable.
moral: Even in retirement, one's skills and knowledge can still protect and serve the community.
